**[FAQ]**

**1) Can I get a dedicated IPv4 address?**
     Ususally not, this service was designed to use NAT IPv4 and native IPv6. 

**2) Do your servers employ Raid?**
     Yes, all servers are using either using RAID 1 or RAID 10.

**3) Do you backup individual VPS containers?**
     No, you are responsible for backups of the data on your VPS. In the event of complete data loss your container will be re-created as soon as possible.

**4) Will you help me install/set up X, Y, Z?**
     This is an unmanaged service, your support options for installs/configurations are posting your questions at the [Lowendspirit ](http://forum.lowendspirit.com) forum or here.

**5) TUN/TAP available?**
     Yes, enable/disable it from the WHMS integrated control panel.

**6) Why does the service list a bandwidth limit when you offer unmetered ports?**
     When that limit is reached the VPS is not suspended like many other providers do. Your connection will only be limited to a lower (still acceptable) speed.
     This is a part of the Fair Usage Policy.

**7) What is this "Fair Usage Policy"?**
     Here on LET it's called "The Golden Rule"; 
> Don’t be a dick.
> Do unto others. Don't do things that decades of netiquette have shown to be offensive. Don't be That Guy. Don't break the rules. When in doubt, don't.
> Just don't be a dick.
       
**8) Examples of unacceptable content/applications**

	* TOR
	* Open proxies
	* Port scanning
	* website and/or service in regards to pirated software


NOTE: Breaking the Fair Usage Policy will not get you suspended, it will get you terminated.
If you have a question about acceptable applications, post it in the [Lowendspirit ](http://forum.lowendspirit.com) forum.


<sub><sup>Behave</sup></sub>
